MICRO
	c BOOTSTRAP
m00 0000000000011100001100000011001111010111 //Sw+0->PC,MAR
m01 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)

	c LOADBR #K
m02 0000000000010100001100110011011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m03 0000000000011100001100000101001110011101 //MDR+0->BR
m04 0000000000010100001100110011011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m05 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
	c LOADSP #K
m06 0000000000010100001100110011011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m07 0000000000011100001100000111001110011101 //MDR+0->SP
m08 0000000000010100001100110011011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m09 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
	c LOADLR #K
m0a 0000000000010100001100110011011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m0b 0000000000011100001100000001001110011101 //MDR+0->LR
m0c 0000000000010100001100110011011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m0d 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
	c PUSH $K
m0e 0000000000000101000101110001001110111111 //SP-LR->NOP,FLAGS
m0f 0011101101010100001100110011011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR,CHECK_N
m10 0011001101110100001100110011001111011110 //PC+0->PC,MAR,CHECK_Z
m11 0000000000011100000100000000001111011101 //MDR+0->NOP,MAR
m12 0000000000011100001100001011001110011101 //MDR+0->TEMP
m13 0000000000010100101101110111011110011110 //SP-1->SP
m14 0000000000010000000101110000001111011111 //SP+0->NOP,MAR
m15 0000000000010000000110110000001100011111 //TEMP+0->NOP,MWE
m16 0000000000010100001100110011011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m17 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
	c POP $K
m18 0000000000000101000101010111001110111111 //BR-SP->NOP,FLAGS
m19 0011101101010100001100110011011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR,CHECK_N
m1a 0000000000011100001100001011001110011101 //MDR+0->TEMP
m1b 0000000000010000000101110000001111011111 //SP+0->NOP,MAR
m1c 0000000000011100001100001001001110011101 //MDR+0->X
m1d 0000000000010000000110110000001111011111 //TEMP+0->NOP,MAR
m1e 0000000000010000000110010000001100011111 //X+0->NOP,MWE
m1f 0000000000010100001101110111011110011110 //SP+1->SP
m20 0000000000010100001100110011011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m21 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
	c ADD
m22 0000000000000101000101010111001110111111 //BR-SP->NOP,FLAGS
m23 0101101101110100001100110011001111011110 //PC+0->PC,MAR,CHECK_Z
m24 0101001101010100001100110011001111011110 //PC+0->PC,MAR,CHECK_N
m25 0000000000010000000101110000001111011111 //SP+0->NOP,MAR
m26 0000000000011100001100001001001110011101 //MDR+0->X
m27 0000000000010100001101110111011110011110 //SP+1->SP
m28 0000000000010000000101110000001111011111 //SP+0->NOP,MAR
m29 0000000000011100001100001011001110011101 //MDR+0->TEMP
m2a 0000000000000100001110111001001110011111 //TEMP+X->X
m2b 0000000000010100101101110111011110011110 //SP-1->SP
m2c 0000000000010000000101110000001111011111 //SP+0->NOP,MAR
m2d 0000000000010000000110010000001100011111 //X+0->NOP,MWE
m2e 0000000000010100001100110011011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m2f 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
	c SUB
m30 0000000000000101000101010111001110111111 //BR-SP->NOP,FLAGS
m31 0101101101110100001100110011001111011110 //PC+0->PC,MAR,CHECK_Z
m32 0101001101010100001100110011001111011110 //PC+0->PC,MAR,CHECK_N
m33 0000000000010000000101110000001111011111 //SP+0->NOP,MAR
m34 0000000000011100001100001001001110011101 //MDR+0->X
m35 0000000000010100001101110111011110011110 //SP+1->SP
m36 0000000000010000000101110000001111011111 //SP+0->NOP,MAR
m37 0000000000011100001100001011001110011101 //MDR+0->TEMP
m38 0000000000000101001110111001001110011111 //TEMP-X->X
m39 0000000000010100101101110111011110011110 //SP-1->SP
m3a 0000000000010000000101110000001111011111 //SP+0->NOP,MAR
m3b 0000000000010000000110010000001100011111 //X+0->NOP,MWE
m3c 0000000000010100001100110011011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m3d 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
MAPPER
m00 02 LOADBR #K
m01 06 LOADSP #K
m02 0a LOADLR #K
m03 0e PUSH $K
m04 18 POP $K
m05 22 ADD
m06 30 SUB
MAIN
m00 00
m01 17
m02 01 
m03 18
m04 02
m05 10
m06 03
m07 20
m08 03
m09 21
m0a 06
m0b 03
m0c 22
m0d 05
m0e 04 
m0f 20
